meta_desc_home: You don‚Äôt hire freelancers, you hire results. We scope, match, manage, and deliver your project from start to finish. On-demand project teams without the overhead.
meta_desc_how_it_works: From idea to invoice, we handle the entire project lifecycle. Discover our streamlined process for delivering guaranteed results without the hassle.
meta_desc_features: The world's first fully managed project delivery platform for businesses that need results‚Äînot freelancers. Explore our unique features.
meta_desc_reviews: Read over {{totalReviews}} reviews from our satisfied clients. See why businesses trust Pay Per Project for high-quality, budget-friendly IT solutions with an average {{averageRating}}-star rating.
meta_desc_contact: Get in touch with our team to discuss your project. We're here to help you turn your ideas into reality. Submit your brief today.
meta_desc_consultation: Get a free, no-obligation consultation. Use our AI Project Predictor to get an instant scope and estimate, or submit your brief manually for a custom quote.
meta_desc_blog: Explore insights, tips, and trends on freelancing, outsourcing, and project management. Your go-to resource for succeeding with the pay-per-project model.
meta_desc_quiz: Not sure what you need? Take our interactive quiz to define your goals and get a perfectly scoped project proposal.
meta_desc_payment_options: Pay for your project in easy, interest-free installments with Klarna and Clearpay. Get your project started today with flexible payment plans.
meta_desc_hire_talent: Access a curated network of top-tier, pre-vetted talent and teams. Find the perfect match for your project without the hiring hassle.
meta_desc_post_project: Easily post your job or project requirements and let our platform match you with the best talent. Streamline your hiring process and get results faster.
meta_desc_white_label: Accelerate your business with our production-ready, white-label solutions. Buy, rebrand, and launch in days, not months.
meta_desc_expert_advice: Connect with industry experts for personalized advice and strategic guidance. Get the insights you need to make informed decisions and drive your business forward.

company_pitch_tagline: Connected by us, protected by us
company_pitch_title: We assign the perfect team for the job
company_pitch_desc: Why spend weeks hunting for talent? We do the heavy lifting. Every project is scoped, matched, managed, and delivered by us. You get a dedicated, on-demand team without the overhead.
company_pitch_feature1_desc: Our experts scope your project and match you with a pre-vetted team, eliminating hiring risks.
company_pitch_feature2_desc: A seasoned manager oversees your project from kickoff to delivery, ensuring smooth progress.
company_pitch_feature3_desc: We handle all testing and QA, guaranteeing the final product meets the highest standards.
company_pitch_feature4_desc: Stay in the loop with regular updates and clear visibility into your project's status at all times.
faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about our results-driven project platform.
hero_title: You Don‚Äôt Hire Freelancers.<1></1> <2>You Hire Results.</2>
hero_subtitle: This isn't a marketplace. It's a results engine. Submit your brief. We handle the rest. Our platform manages your project from start to finish, ensuring guaranteed outcomes without the hiring hassle.
hero_form_cta: Get a free quote and project plan within 24 hours.
key_features_subtitle: We're not another freelancer marketplace. We're a results-driven platform that guarantees outcomes, saving you time, money, and headaches.
referral_subtitle: Invite others and get rewarded‚Äîwith no limits.
zero_fees_desc: We believe in full transparency. 100% of your budget goes to the company you hire. We charge a small, one-time commission to the company on your first project, never to you.
zero_fees_rate_desc: On average, that's LESS THAN HIRING FREELANCERS directly.
how_it_works_comparison_subtitle: See how our fully managed model stacks up against the old way of hiring. It's no contest.
how_it_works_differentiators_subtitle: We're not just another platform. We're a fully managed service with built-in advantages you won't find anywhere else.
how_it_works_final_cta_subtitle: Submit your project brief and get a free, no-obligation quote and detailed project plan from our experts. Let's build something great together.
how_it_works_hero_title: From Idea to Invoice,<1></1> <2>We Handle It All.</2>
how_it_works_hero_subtitle: Forget the chaos of hiring and management. Our end-to-end platform is designed for one thing: to deliver guaranteed results with unparalleled ease.
how_it_works_problem_title: The Old Way is Broken. Here's Why.
how_it_works_problem_subtitle: Traditional hiring is a full-time job filled with risk, overhead, and uncertainty. It's time for a smarter approach.
how_it_works_showcase_subtitle: Real projects, real impact. We connect great ideas with brilliant execution.
how_it_works_quiz_cta_subtitle: Our quick quiz helps you clarify your vision and provides an instant recommendation.
how_it_works_solution_subtitle: We've replaced the chaos with a streamlined, fully managed process that ensures quality and peace of mind from start to finish.
how_it_works_why_subtitle: Our entire model is built on four pillars that guarantee your success where other platforms fail.
top_bar_info3: Referrals: Get up to 20% cash back
faq_a_execution_service: It's our core model. You bring the idea, and we handle the entire execution pipeline‚Äîfrom scoping and planning to matching you with a vetted team, managing the project, and guaranteeing delivery. You get the outcome without the operational overhead.
faq_q_difference: How is this different from Upwork or hiring freelancers?
faq_a_difference: We're not a marketplace where you sift through bids. We're a results engine. We provide one perfect, pre-vetted team, include project management, and guarantee the outcome. This saves you time, reduces risk, and ensures quality.
faq_q_project_types: What kind of projects can you handle?
faq_a_project_types: We specialize in digital projects, including custom software development, mobile app creation, website design and development, branding, UX/UI design, and digital strategy. If it's digital, we can build it.
faq_a_who_for: We serve a wide range of clients, from pre-revenue startups and solo founders who need to launch lean, to established enterprises looking to accelerate projects without adding headcount. Our model is flexible to fit any scale.
faq_q_pricing: How is your pricing so competitive?
faq_a_pricing: Our model is built on efficiency. By managing a network of elite, vetted teams and streamlining the project management process, we eliminate the costly overhead and agency markups. You pay for pure execution.
faq_q_lpnpl: What does 'Launch Now, Pay Later' mean?
faq_a_lpnpl: For eligible pre-revenue startups, we offer a deferred payment plan. We'll build and launch your MVP with zero upfront cost. You only pay once you've launched or secured your first round of funding. It's our investment in your success.
faq_q_insurance: Can you explain the 'Project Insurance' guarantee?
faq_a_insurance: It's our commitment to your success. If your project doesn't deliver on the agreed-upon scope and objectives, we will dedicate resources to fix it at no additional cost to you. Your results are guaranteed.
faq_q_referral: How does the 'Referral for a Free Project Scope' work?
faq_a_referral: When you successfully refer 2-3 new clients who start a project with us, we'll provide a complete, in-depth project scoping and planning service for your next big idea, a value of up to ¬£5000, completely free.
faq_a_creator_miles: Think of them as frequent flyer points for your projects. Every project you complete with us earns you miles that you can redeem for discounts on future projects, service upgrades, or even faster delivery times.
faq_q_build_in_public: How do I qualify for the 'Build in Public 20% Off' discount?
faq_a_build_in_public: If you're willing to share your project journey publicly (e.g., through blog posts, social media), we offer a 20% discount on key milestones. It's a great way for creators and startups to build an audience while saving money.
faq_q_team_satisfaction: What happens if I'm not happy with the matched team?
faq_a_team_satisfaction: Your satisfaction is paramount. In the unlikely event you're not satisfied with the team we match you with, we will find a replacement team that meets your standards, at no extra cost or delay to your project.
faq_q_start_time: How long does it take to start a project?
faq_a_start_time: Our process is built for speed. After you submit your brief, we can have you matched with a vetted team and a full project plan ready for your approval in within 24-48 hours.
faq_a_ip_protection: Absolutely. All projects are covered by strict NDAs and IP protection clauses by default. Your ideas and assets are secure with us, and all IP developed during the project is transferred to you upon completion.
faq_q_upgrade_project: Can you upgrade my existing, underperforming project?
faq_a_upgrade_project: Yes! Our 'Upgrade Any Old Project' offer is perfect for this. We'll analyze what went wrong with your existing brand, website, or app and revamp it for half the price of starting from scratch. It's a cost-effective way to get the results you initially wanted.
kf_our_managed_desc: Your project is fully managed by us, from scoping and vetting to final delivery.
kf_our_commission_desc: The price you are quoted is exactly what you pay. No hidden fees or commission.
kf_our_talent_desc: We handle the entire vetting and management process. You get top talent without the hassle.
kf_our_assigned_desc: Your project is scoped, quoted, and assigned to the perfect team within one business day.
kf_our_nda_desc: Your intellectual property is protected by default with our standard agreements.
kf_our_pm_desc: A dedicated Project Manager ensures your project stays on track and on budget.
kf_our_access_desc: Collaborate with your entire team with built-in support for multiple users.
kf_our_enterprise_desc: Built for serious business with SLAs, robust legal frameworks, and fast-track options.
kf_their_p2p_desc: You are left to navigate a chaotic, peer-to-peer marketplace on your own.
kf_their_commission_desc: Expect to pay significant commission and processing fees on both sides of the transaction.
kf_their_talent_desc: You must search, filter, interview, negotiate with, and manage freelancers yourself.
kf_their_bidding_desc: The process often involves days of bidding wars and back-and-forth negotiations.
kf_their_negotiations_desc: NDAs and IP agreements are not standard and require complex manual negotiation.
kf_their_pm_desc: A dedicated project manager is often only available in expensive enterprise tiers.
kf_their_accounts_desc: Platforms are typically designed for individual clients, not collaborative teams.
kf_their_teams_desc: Lacks the security, legal, and support infrastructure required for enterprise needs.
feature_outcome_desc: Clients choose goals, and our AI recommends a pre-scoped project (e.g., ‚ÄúLaunch a SaaS site ‚Üí 3 pages + onboarding flow‚Äù).
feature_outcome_unique: Guided project design for clients with unclear vision or limited tech know-how.
feature_growth_desc: After delivery, activate 'Growth Mode' for 30/60/90 days‚Äîincludes performance audits, iterations, and optimization.
feature_growth_unique: Fiverr/Upwork end at delivery. We start creating long-term impact after.
feature_health_desc: A visual client-side dashboard showing % completion, estimated days left, and risk flags if deadlines shift.
feature_health_unique: Real-time clarity‚Äînot buried in chat threads.
feature_ip_desc: Automatically transfer IP at delivery into a secure, client-only digital vault with source files and license docs.
feature_ip_unique: Legally secure and organized for you, forever.
feature_b2b_desc: Our lean model and optimized processes allow us to provide unbeatable value for the quality of service.
feature_b2b_unique: Enterprise-grade results without the enterprise price tag.
feature_whitelabel_desc: Agencies can resell our services under their own brand, with a white-labeled dashboard and domain masking.
feature_whitelabel_unique: Instant revenue stream for agencies who want Done-For-You services.
feature_startup_enterprise_desc: Our flexible solutions are designed to cater to the needs of every business, from agile startups to large-scale enterprises.
feature_startup_enterprise_unique: A tailored approach that grows with you.
feature_reporting_desc: At the end of a project, we deliver a brief analytics report or ROI snapshot (e.g., 'Your landing page got 43% higher conversions').
feature_reporting_unique: We demonstrate outcome, not just delivery.
feature_lpnpl_desc: For eligible pre-revenue startups, we offer zero upfront cost options to get your project off the ground.
feature_lpnpl_unique: We invest in your idea before you do.
feature_vault_title: Private File Vault with Lifetime Access
feature_vault_desc: Every client has a private repository where all their project files are stored‚Äîforever.
feature_vault_unique: Removes file-loss stress and boosts retention.
feature_credits_desc: 15% of your project cost is automatically converted into credits you can use for future projects or add-ons.
feature_credits_unique: A partnership that rewards your loyalty.
feature_clone_desc: Let clients clone any past brief and relaunch it in seconds (e.g., ‚ÄúClone last blog project‚Äù ‚Üí tweak ‚Üí submit).
feature_clone_unique: Perfect for recurring tasks like content, emails, design, and SEO.
feature_upgrade_title: Upgrade Any Old Project ‚Äî Half Price
feature_upgrade_desc: Bring us a project that didn't work out from another platform or freelancer, and we'll revamp it for 50% off.
feature_upgrade_unique: We turn past failures into future successes.
feature_miles_desc: Earn points, or 'Creator Miles,' on every project you complete. Redeem them for discounts and special perks.
feature_miles_unique: A loyalty program for builders and visionaries.
feature_bip_desc: If you agree to share your project journey publicly on social media, we'll give you a 20% discount on the project cost.
feature_bip_unique: We support and reward transparency in the startup community.
feature_referral_title: Refer 2-3, Get a Free Project Scope
feature_referral_desc: Turn your network into tangible value. Refer new clients and earn a free, comprehensive project scope worth up to ¬£5000.
feature_referral_unique: The most valuable referral program in the industry.
feature_insurance_desc: If a project fails to meet the agreed-upon scope and quality benchmarks, we will fix it for free. Guaranteed.
feature_insurance_unique: Complete peace of mind. Your success is our responsibility.
feature_eaas_desc: Have an idea? Upload it. We handle the scoping, team matching, project management, and delivery. You focus on your business.
feature_eaas_unique: The simplest way to turn an idea into a finished project.
trust_badge_3_desc: Designed to deliver, not just complete.
